name: COMO Metropolitan London
description: Located amongst a range of well-known tourist hot spots, boutiques and eateries, COMO Metropolitan London is ideal for guests wanting to explore London and its surroundings. It provides 5-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. There are a variety of facilities at the hotel, including body treatments, free Wi-Fi and a spa and wellness centre. Couples will delight in the hotel's features like valet parking and massage services. Guests staying at COMO Metropolitan London can enjoy the luxurious rooms that provide a private bathroom, a mini bar and a coffee maker. They all include a desk and an in-room safe. During their stay at COMO Metropolitan London, guests can dine at Nobu, which serves South American and Japanese cuisine. Each evening, guests are invited to relax in the lounge bar. COMO Metropolitan London is within walking distance of Bond Street, Buckingham Palace and Grosvenor Square. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Knightsbridge Tube Station, which allows easy access in and around London.Revato

name: St Martins Lane London
description: With stunning, innovative design located within London's Covent Garden, St Martins Lane London boasts stylish public areas and guest rooms created by Philippe Starck. Rooms feature striking floor-to-ceiling windows and benefit from interactive light installations and flat-screen HD TVs. There is complimentary access to gym and complimentary gym kit laundry. Free bicycle rental is also available from the hotel. Situated just off the lobby, The Den and The Restaurant are the perfect places to enjoy the new All-Day Dining menu, afternoon tea, or sip on a Gin & Tonic. Step into gourmet eatery EllaMia London for a perfect coffee and sweet treat. As day turns to night, seek innovative cocktails behind the façade of a boutique tea counter in Blind Spot London. Charing Cross Station is just a 5-minute walk away, while Covent Garden Market and The Royal Opera House are also just 5 minutes’ walk away. Leicester Square is less than 10 minutes’ walk away, and Trafalgar Square is less than 5 minutes' walk.

name: Hilton London Angel Islington
description: The Hilton London Angel Islington is located in the heart of fashionable North London area Islington close to Kings Cross and with excellent access to Central London. The hotel is next door to the British Design Center (BDC). A five-minute walk takes you to Angel Tube Station. The Northern Line is one stop from Kings Cross St Pancras and EuroStar. This is a great location for business or leisure with a wide range of restaurants and bars nearby. The hotel offers a range of elegantly designed bedrooms and suites. Upgrade to an Executive Room or Suite and you can access our Executive Lounge. During summer 2019 the hotels ground floor underwent a transformational renovation program (complete Sept 2019). This includes a new lobby area, grab and go facility, improved Executive Lounge and new food and beverage offering. The Halo Bar and Restaurant opened during July 2019 and serves breakfast followed by an all-day menu for guests and residents. This is a great place to be and be seen offering signature cocktails and an exciting food menu celebrating international dishes. It specializes in sharing dishes and small plates. - The hotel's Angel Suite offers a small meeting solution with state-of-the-art equipment and flexible set-up options. - There is a 24-hour fitness room at the hotel which is exclusively for hotel guests. - WiFi is complimentary to Hilton Honors members. Sign up prior to arrival or ask one of our team to enroll you free of charge. Key Features: * Accessible location beside tube stations * Outside the Congestion charge Zone * WiFi throughout hotel * Halo Restaurant and Bar * Next Door to BDC * Car parking facilities beside hotel (chargeable) * Close to Kings Cross * Emirates Stadium and Tottenham Hotspur Stadiums are nearby All rooms come with: * Tea & coffee making facilities and biscuits * 42-inch plasma TV (with satellite, digital and pay TV channels) * Individually controlled heating and air conditioning * Work desk * Iron and board * Mini-refrigerator * Hairdryer * Laptop safe * US plug socket * Alarm clock * Bathrooms with a spacious walk-in shower or a bathtub and overhead showerHilton

name: Renaissance London Heathrow Hotel
description: Renaissance London Heathrow Hotel welcomes you with spacious accommodation, modern amenities and an exceptional location. You'll find our hotel on the outskirts of Heathrow Airport, just a short distance from nearby attractions including Twickenham Stadium and within easy reach of Central London. Contemporary rooms and suites offer deluxe bedding, free Wi-Fi access, 24-hour room service and stunning views of the airport runway from soundproof windows. Additional perks throughout the hotel include a modern fitness center. We proudly offer several superb dining options - from global dining at Market Garden Restaurant to Starbucks® coffee at Cafe Cha. Those hosting an event near Heathrow will be thrilled with our well-appointed venues, including the pillar-free Westminster Suite - as well as comprehensive planning and catering services, an on-site business center and abundant on-site parking. Whatever brings you to the area, we know you'll enjoy your stay at Renaissance London Heathrow Hotel.Marriott

name: Courtyard by Marriott London City Airport
description: Courtyard by Marriott London City Airport is 5 minutes walk from London City Airport and the DLR, making it a perfect location for those traveling on business and leisure. The hotel is also a convenient 9 minute walk to ExCel London. The DLR connects you straight to all of London's key transport hubs, The O2 Arena and Canary Wharf. The hotel benefits from 184 bedrooms, a bar and restaurant, a gym and three meeting rooms for up to 50 delegates. Settle into spacious rooms with luxury signature Marriott bedding, complimentary high-speed WiFi, bedside charging point, 55-inch Smart TV, walk-in shower and triple-glazed windows, ensuring soundproof serenity. Enjoy a full English breakfast, bar snack and drinks, lunch or dinner in The Kitchen & Bar at Courtyard - providing fresh locally sourced cuisine and tranquil space to unwind.Marriott

name: Royal Lancaster London
description: The five-star Royal Lancaster London is renowned for its panoramic views over Hyde Park. The 411 well-appointed guestrooms and suites have luxurious and elegant dcor and are fully-equipped with modern facilities such as air-conditioning, satellite television channels, mini bars, en-suite bathrooms and power showers. During their stay, guests can dine in the award-winning Nipa restaurant, offering authentic Thai cuisine. Additionally Tony Page at Island Grill offers an alternative a la carte experience. Royal Lancaster London is one of Europes leading and most flexible meeting and banqueting venues. Its conference rooms have the ability to cater for all sizes of events, from small business meetings, to large receptions for up to 3,000 people. The hotel is only a few minutes walk from the bustling shopping districts of Oxford and Bond Street, London's West End theatres, museums and tourist attractions. Even Heathrow Airport is a mere 20-minute ride on the Heathrow Express from the nearby Paddington Railway Station.iHotelier/iStay

name: DoubleTree by Hilton London Angel Kings Cross
description: Set in the heart of bustling, trendy Islington only short walk from Kings Cross St Pancras Rail Station, the home of Eurostar and Harry Potter platform. We are also outside of the Congestion Zone and conveniently a 10-minute drive from Arsenal Emirates FC, and a 20-minute drive to the new Tottenham Hotspur FC. We are also within a short walking distance of the Sadler's Wells Theatre and Business Design Centre. Our hotel features a restaurant, Marco Pierre White Steakhouse, a Fitness Centre, Wellness Room, Five Feet to Fitness Rooms, and every stay starts with a warm chocolate chip cookie.Hilton

name: Moxy London Excel
description: London is known for the bright lights and constant buzz; London Excel is the home of world-leading events all year through. And while sampling all that, you can stay at the Moxy London Excel, a stylish, affordable hotel within the heart of the city. Moxy is perfectly located close to the Excel Exhibition Center and London City Airport. Moxy combines smart service an up-to-date technology with a fabulous design. Enjoy food and drinks 24/7, our super-duper fast and free Wi-Fi. The lobby of Moxy is as buzzing as London Excel itself.Marriott

name: Crowne Plaza London - Kings Cross
description: Experience an upscale London hotel designed to flow between local experiences and business. Located near St Pancras International Station, and Farringdon Station, Crowne Plaza® London - Kings Cross is a short walk to the Eurostar trains, Elizabeth Line, and London Underground at Russell Square and King's Cross St. Pancras to Heathrow Airport (LHR). Walk out to discover our trendy King’s Cross neighborhood with restaurants, shops, entertainment, and attractions such as the British Museum, and Covent Garden. Plan a meeting or gathering in our flexible events space. Catch up over cocktails and conversation at the Bloom Bar and Lounge. Get a great night’s sleep in sophisticated guest rooms with contemporary décor. Connect, unplug, or explore your way.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: The Savoy
description: The Savoy has been at the forefront of the luxury hotel scene for over 130 years. The hotel 267 rooms and suites celebrate The Savoy dual historical influence with either Edwardian or art deco design, and guests of suites are looked after by the Savoy Butlers. Within The Savoy, guests will also find some of the most well-known restaurants and bars in London. With exceptional service at the heart of everything, a Savoy experience is built on memories created and stories told across the generationsaccorhotels.com

name: Holiday Inn London - Kensington High St.
description: The stylish Holiday Inn London Kensington High Street is located in a quiet spot close to the shops of Kensington High Street just a few minutes walk from the nearest tube underground station. Following an extensive multi million pound refurbishment the hotel offers 706 modern guest rooms all equipped with high speed WiFi Internet connection along with a host of other modern amenities and features stylishly and thoughtfully designed, Located in the back of the hotel a stunning private garden awaits you. Or enjoy our Health Club which has a full length swimming pool Whirlpool sauna steam room treatment rooms and a fully equipped gym. Kensington Health Club and Spa provides a great contrast from the hustle and bustle of the city by providing our guests with a luxurious tranquil retreat. We can provide you with an escape from the stress of everyday life and give you your own space where you can listen to your body and indulge accordingly in the great facilities it has to offer. Swimming pool and gym are complimentary and Spa packages are available.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Novotel London Waterloo
description: Novotel London Waterloo Hotel is within walking distance of the Thames, Big Ben and Buckingham Palace - making it the ideal stay for families. Make the most of this central London location by requesting a room with views of London's breathtaking skyline. After a busy day you'll want to unwind in our modern hotel gym, complete with a saunarium.accorhotels.com
